list.listitem: Character (arts), an agent or creature in a work of art, including literature, drama, cinema, opera, etc.
Character sketchor character, a literary description of a character type
Characters (Theophrastus)''Characters'' (Theophrastus), a classical Greek set of character sketches attributed to Theophrastus
Character (novel)''Character'' (novel), a 1936 Dutch novel by Ferdinand BordewijkCharacter (film)''Character'' (film), a 1997 Dutch film based on that novel

Game character (disambiguation), various types of character in a video game or role playing gamePlayer character, as above but who is controlled or whose actions are directly chosen by a playerNon-player character, as above but not player-controlled
The Characters, aCharacters (Theophrastus)book by the Greek philosopher Theophrastus
Character education, a US term for values education
Character (biology), the abstraction of an observable physical or biochemical trait of an organism
Character (mathematics), a type of function used in algebra

Character (symbol), a sign or symbolCharacter (computing), a unit of information roughly corresponding to a graphemeChinese character, a written language symbol (sinogram) used in Chinese, Japanese, and other languages
Moral character, an evaluation of a particular individual's durable moral qualities
Character (income tax), a type of income for tax purposes in the USA
Charaktery, a monthly magazine in Poland
